102224.name: Form of the Cobra
102224.text:
[pro] [COMBAT] Strike: steal 1 blood or life (becoming blood).
[PRO] [ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable as the action is announced. +1 stealth, even if stealth is not yet needed.

102225.name: Form of the Wolf

102225.text:
Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Form of the Wolf each combat.

Master: Discipline.

100775.name: Fortschritt Library

Master.
Search your library for a Gehenna event card. Show it to all players and add it to your hand. Discard down to your hand size afterward. Only one Fortschritt Library may be played per game.

100776.name: Fortune Teller
100776.text:
Mortal with 1 life.
During your minion phase, you may look at one card picked at random from your prey's hand.

100777.name: Fortune Teller Shop
100777.text:
Unique location.
You can lock this card to give a Ravnos +1 stealth.

Only usable if a vampire would successfully hunt.

[QUI] As above, but do not lock this reacting vampire.

100779.text:
Unique location.
Each non-titled Toreador antitribu you control gets +1 vote. Any vampire can burn this card as a (D) action that costs 1 blood.

+1 stealth action.
Put this card on a younger Laibon in your uncontrolled region and move 4 blood from the blood bank to that vampire. (This card remains in play.) A vampire may have only one Founders of the Ebony Kingdom. Burn this card if the vampire leaves the uncontrolled region.

100781.name: Fourth Cycle, The

Requires 2 or more Gehenna events in play.
After this card enters play, burn all Gehenna events and conviction cards, then send all vampires with capacity 3 or less to torpor. Gehenna events cannot be played.

100782.name: Fourth Tradition: The Accounting
100782.text:

[cel] X is 0. Strike: dodge.

[pot] Is not a damaging strike.

100784.text:
[pot] Strike: destroy equipment.

100785.text:
Unique Nod fragment.

100786.name: Framing, The

+1 stealth action. Requires an anarch.
(D) Put this card on the acting anarch and choose a ready minion. If the anarch with this card is blocked, this card is burned. Then the blocking minion enters combat with the chosen minion instead of this anarch (or the action ends with no combat if that combat cannot occur).

100787.name: Framing an Ancient Grudge
100787.text:
Master.
Choose a prince or primogen, or burn 3 pool to choose a justicar. The chosen vampire loses his or her title.

[FOR] Cannot be played if the action was "ended."
Is played after resolution, after all combats (if any) are handled, but still during the action. Action modifiers and effects that can be played "after resolution" can be played before or after it.

100788.text:
Only usable after action resolution.
[for] Only usable if the action was successful. Unlock this vampire.
[FOR] Only usable if the action was blocked. Unlock this vampire.

100789.name: Free Fight

rulings.text: A vampire with no circle designation is in his own unique circle. Vampires with the same name (eg. {The Embrace}, non-unique vampires) do not share a circle by default, each has his own circle of one by default.
[SAN] The optional press can only be used during the current round.

100789.text:
Only usable before range is determined.
[san] Lock this Blood Brother and any number of ready unlocked members you control of this circle. Once each round before range is determined, or whenever your combatant leaves the ready region, you may choose one of these ready Blood Brothers to become the combatant instead (and combat continues).
[SAN] As above, and each of these Blood Brothers gets an optional press this combat.

100790.name: Free States Rant

rulings.text: If there are insuffient targets to which to allocate all of the points allowed, then the card cannot be played.
The votes provided by the Priscii sub-referendum are not affected.

100790.text:
Requires an Independent or Anarch vampire.
Allocate X points among one or more ready vampires, where X is half the capacity of the acting vampire (rounded up). No more than 3 points points can be allocated to each vampire. Successful referendum means each vampire burns 1 blood for each point allocated. In this referendum, non-priscus titles are worth 1 less vote each, priscus title is worth 1 less ballot, and burning the Edge is worth 1 additional vote.

100791.name: Frenzy

rulings.text: Only prevents the use of equipment after it is played - it will not cancel the effects of equipment used before it is played.
Can be played on a minion that cannot play or use presses (eg. Mukhtar Bey) and does provide the presses, the minion is not the one pressing.
The provided press is applied before any other press. Another press cannot be used to continue (eg. {Boxed In}, {Talbot's Chainsaw}) if there's already a press to continue.

100791.text:
Master: out-of-turn. Frenzy.
Only usable before range is chosen. Choose a vampire in combat. In this round, that vampire cannot use equipment and cannot use presses to end combat. This round has a press, only usable to continue combat.

100792.name: Friend of Mine

rulings.text: When played, a multi-Disciplines card counts as requiring the Discipline(s) being used. In the hand, library, or ash heap, the card is considered to require any and/or all Disciplines listed on it.

100792.text:
Requires an Anarch.
[for] Reduce a bleed against you by 2.
[nec] +1 intercept.
[obt] Only usable after a vampire successfully bleeds you. The acting vampire burns 2 blood.

100793.name: From a Sinking Ship

rulings.text: Requirements do not apply when taking control of a card already in play.

100793.text:
Master.
Take control of a minion controlled by a Methuselah with 3 or fewer pool. Not usable to take control of a vampire with capacity 7 or more. Only one From a Sinking Ship can be played in a game.

100794.name: Frontal Assault

rulings.text: If you play more than one, you gain and loose pool for all of them (they stack).

100794.text: Put this card in play. Each ready minion you control can enter combat with a minion controlled by your prey as a (D) action. 100795.text:
+1 stealth action. A Methuselah can have only one Frozen Object.
[ser] (D) Look at any Methuselah's hand and discard all equipment cards from it.

[TEM] Put this card in play. You can burn this card after a minion successfully bleeds you to inflict 2 unpreventable environmental damage on the bleeding minion.

100796.name: Fueled by Heart's Blood

rulings.text: Is not replaced until the condition is met, even if it is burned.

100796.text:
Gehenna. Do not replace until a vampire commits diablerie.

100797.name: Funeral Wake

Usable by a locked vampire.
[nec] Unlock a mummy, wraith, or zombie ally you control.
[NEC] Unlock up to two mummy, wraith, and/or zombie allies you control.

Trifle.

100799.text:
Master.

If you are ousted, your predator gains an additional victory point. At the end of the game, if you have not been ousted, you gain an additional victory point.

100800.name: Game of Malkav
100800.text: Each other Methuselah secretly chooses a number between 1 and 5 inclusive; you choose a number between 1 and 6 inclusive. Each Methuselah holds a hand out with the chosen number of counters in it. Reveal the choices simultaneously. Each Methuselah gains the amount of pool they chose unless another Methuselah chose exactly 1 less than they did, in which case, they burn that amount of pool instead.

100801.name: Games of Instinct

100801.text:

(D) Enter combat with an older vampire controlled by another Methuselah. At the end of that combat, if only one combatant is ready, that ready vampire gains blood equal to the opposing vampire's capacity from the blood bank.

100802.name: Gang Tactics

rulings.text: If blocked, no other effect can be used to reset the range, but other pre-range effects can be played.
If another effect also sets the range, the first to resolve has priority (eg. {Asanbonsam Ghoul} and {Neutral Guard} resolve after).
Must be played (as well as other "as the action is announced" action modifiers) before action modifiers that are not explicitly played "as the action is announced" (e.g., {Conditioning}).
Replace the action card (if any) before playing it.

If another effect was already setting that round's range (e.g. {Neutral Guard}), that effect has priority.

100802.text:
Only usable when the action is announced.
If the action is blocked, the resulting combat is at close range. Other effects cannot change this; skip the determine range step during that combat.

100803.name: Gang Territory

Master: unique location.

Master.
Put this card on a Gangrel. This vampire gets -1 bleed.

100805.text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Cancel a blood hunt called on a Gangrel antitribu. You may play this card during your turn.

100806.name: Gangrel Justicar
100806.text:
Title.

100807.name: Gangrel Revel
100807.text:
Unique.
Put this card in play. Gangrel you control get +1 strength. Non-Ravnos minions can burn this card as a (D) action.

100808.name: Gargoyle Slave

Ally with 3 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed.

Both the card in the ash heap and the card in hand have to be named when announcing the action or effect.

100809.text:
Unique location.

100810.name: Garrote

100810.text:
Melee weapon.
Strike: strength damage, only usable at close range. If the opposing vampire would go to torpor during the strike resolution step of this strike and the bearer remains ready, the bearer may burn this card to burn the opposing vampire instead. This is not considered diablerie.

100811.name: Gas-Powered Chainsaw

rulings.text: A second copy allows a second use in the same combat.

100811.text:
Melee weapon.
3 damage each strike. This weapon is only usable once each combat.

102290.name: Gate of Acheron, The

rulings.text: The actions provided by Open war are considered Actions requiring a Hecata.

102290.text:
+1 stealth action. Unique.
Put this card in play with 1 counter. During your unlock phase, add 1 counter to this card. During your prey's unlock phase, for each counter on this card, they burn 1 pool or remove a library card at random in their ash heap from the game. Hecata you control with capacity 4 or more can add 1 counter to this card as a +1 stealth action. Vampires can burn this card as a (D) action.

100812.name: Gather

rulings.text: Only usable to move the target vampire from your uncontrolled region to your ready region. It cannot rescue a vampire from torpor.
Can be used (if unlocked) during any Methuselah's influence phase.

100812.text:
+1 stealth action. Unique.
Put this card in play, locked, and choose a younger Gangrel in your uncontrolled region. During the influence phase, you may lock this card to move that Gangrel from your uncontrolled region to your ready region, with any counters he or she has, unless that Gangrel would contest a vampire in play. Any vampire can burn this card as a (D) action that costs 1 pool.

100813.name: Gear Up

When played, a multi-Disciplines card counts as requiring the Discipline(s) being used. In the hand, library, or ash heap, the card is considered to require any and/or all Disciplines listed on it.

100813.text:
+1 stealth action. Requires an Anarch.
[nec] This Anarch unlocks. Move a card from your ash heap to your hand.
[pre] This Anarch unlocks and gets +1 stealth until the end of the turn.
[vic] This Anarch unlocks and gets +1 strength until your unlock phase.

100814.name: Gemini's Mirror

rulings.text: Does not protect the minion's equipment, retainers, or any other cards on him. Just him and his blood.
[obf] The optional maneuver cannot be used if the strike cannot be used (eg. {Hidden Lurker}).

100814.text:
[obf] Strike: dodge, with an optional maneuver.

100815.name: Gestalt

100815.text:
Choose X ready Blood Brothers you control who belong to the same circle as this reacting vampire (including this vampire). Each chosen vampire must burn a blood, or this card has no effect.
[san] +X intercept.
[SAN] +X intercept, and this vampire may play cards as if he or she possessed all of the chosen Blood Brothers' Disciplines for the remainder of the action.

100816.name: Ghost-Eater

A minion can only perform this special hunt once per turn.
Is an undirected action, even when targeting another Methuselah's ash heap.
Cannot be played if no target is available in any Methuselah's ash heap.

100816.text:
+1 stealth hunt action.
Choose a minion or retainer in any ash heap who was burned from play since your last turn. Remove the chosen minion or retainer from the game to add X blood to this Harbinger of Skulls, where X is the capacity of the chosen vampire or the starting life of the chosen ally or retainer.

100817.name: Ghoul Escort

rulings.text: Cannot be used if blocked when leaving torpor, as no combat would happen.
Ghouls are monsters, not mortal.

100817.text:
Ghoul with 4 life. Requires a ready vampire.
When this vampire is blocked, he or she may burn this retainer and unlock instead of entering combat. (This does not unlock the blocker.)

100818.name: Ghoul Messenger

rulings.text: Ghouls are monsters, not mortal.

100818.text:
Ghoul with 1 life. Requires a ready Laibon.
The vampire with this retainer may move it to another ready vampire as a +1 stealth action. If the action is successful, the new employer gains 1 blood from the blood bank, and the acting vampire unlocks at the end of the turn. If the action is blocked, cancel combat, burn the Messenger, and do not lock the blocking minion.

100819.name: Ghoul Retainer

rulings.text: The 1 Damage is not inflicted at long range.
The Ghoul is not the bearer of the weapon, the employer is (eg. using {Garrote} does not allow the bearer to burn the opponent, {Zip Gun}'s damage go to the employer).

The Ghoul uses weapon as if making the strike, including all side-effects (eg. {Zip Gun}'s damage, {Weighted Walking Stick} tokens), and is not limited to damage dealing strikes (eg. {Rowan Ring} sends to torpor, {Flash Grenade} ends combat). It is not a strike and cannot provide a maneuver, press or additional strike to the employer (eg. {Meat Hook}).
The Ghoul cannot play ammo cards (not even with a {Magazine}), although it can benefit from ammo cards played by the employer in an earlier round (eg. {Scattershot}).
The damage is environmental, the retainer is the damage source. Immunity to retainer or retainer type works against it.
Damage is inflicted even against a dodge. A "strike: combat ends" ends combat before damage is applied, as will a combattant going to torpor during first strike.
Ghouls are monsters, not mortal.

100819.text:
Ghoul with 2 life. 1 strength.
During the initial strike resolution each round, the Ghoul Retainer inflicts 1 damage or may use a weapon not used by the employing minion (or another retainer) that round (either before or after). This is not a strike, although it does count as "using" the weapon.

100820.name: Ghouled

rulings.text: The ally is recruited as a mortal and changed to a ghoul afterwards (eg. {Sunset Strip, Hollywood} can be used to reduce its cost). His "starting life" is still the base mortal amount.
Goes to the ash heap when played, if it has been removed when the action succeeds, it has no effect.
Ghouls are monsters, not mortal.
Must be played (as well as other "as the action is announced" action modifiers) before action modifiers that are not explicitly played "as the action is announced" (e.g., {Conditioning}).
Replace the action card (if any) before playing it.
Does not stack with similar effects (or another copy of itself) to provide superior version of the discipline(s) (e.g. {Leech} and {Putrescent Servitude} together does not provide superior [POT])
Can be used to meet one (but not more than one) of the normal Discipline requirements of a multi-Discipline card.
While a minion has an effect that allows them to play cards that require Discipline(s), they do not actually have those Discipline(s).

Multiple similar effects (e.g. two {Infernal Familiar}, or {Ian Forestal} with an {Infernal Familiar}) cannot be used to meet the requirements of a multi-Discipline card that the minion is missing one or more Disciplines to play.
The ally counts as "independent" when playing cards as a vampire

100820.text:
Only usable when the action to recruit a mortal ally is announced.
If this action is successful, put this card on that ally and add 1 additional life to the ally from the blood bank. This ally is considered a ghoul and not a mortal. Once each combat, this ally can play a strike card that requires basic Potence [pot] as a vampire.

100821.name: Ghouled Street Thug

rulings.text: If they use their last life to play an action modifier, the action fails. If they use their last life to play a strike, combat ends before strike resolution.
If they takes aggravated damage from a card they plays as a vampire (eg. {Burst of Sunlight}), they lose one life but do not go to torpor.
If they use their last life to pay for an action, the action still resolves fully. If that leads to an oust, the oust is resolved before resolving effects triggered by the fact that they burn.
If a card they play as a vampire sends them to torpor (eg. {Reform Body}), they burn. REVERSAL of previous rulings.
They cannot use a card to commit diablerie (eg. {Amaranth})
Ghouls are monsters, not mortal.
The ally counts as "independent" when playing cards as a vampire

100821.text:
Ghoul with 2 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
This ally can strike: 1R damage. This ally can play cards requiring basic Potence [pot] as a 2-capacity vampire.

100822.name: Ghouls of Plaza Morería, The

100822.text:
Unique ghoul with 2 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
The Ghouls of Plaza Morería can strike: 1R damage. They get 1 optional maneuver each combat. They can burn 1 blood from a ready vampire and put 1 container counter on themselves as a +1 stealth (D) action. Any ready Banu Haqim can burn X container counters from them to gain X blood as a +1 stealth action.

100823.name: Gianna di Canneto

rulings.text: She can use her ability to burn an equipment an opponent has commited to use as a strike (eg. by using the maneuver of a {.44 Magnum}). In this case the opponent strike has no effect.
She cannot use her ability to inflict damage if a "Strike: combat ends" was used, or if combat ends due to first strike aggravated damage.
They can lock to use their ability the turn they where recruited.

100823.text:
Unique wraith with 2 life. 1 strength, 1 bleed.
If another minion you control is in combat, Gianna can lock and burn herself to burn an equipment on the opposing minion, or lock during normal strike resolution to inflict 1 unpreventable damage on the opposing minion.

100824.name: Giant's Blood

rulings.text: Cannot target an uncontrolled vampire.

100824.text:
Only one Giant's Blood can be played in a game.
Choose a vampire. The chosen vampire gains enough blood to reach full capacity.

100825.name: Gift of Bellona

rulings.text: [val] Can be used when fetching a weapon from another minion, even if other equipments are also retrieved.
When played, a multi-Disciplines card counts as requiring the Discipline(s) being used. In the hand, library, or ash heap, the card is considered to require any and/or all Disciplines listed on it.
[VAL] Requirements apply but do not count as requirements for the action (eg. you cannot use CrimethInc. if the card requires an Anarch).

[VAL] This does not count as performing the action to employ/recruit/equip this retainer/ally/equipment in respect to section 3 of the rules. The same vampire can play the respective card in a normal fashion during their turn, if unlocked.
[VAL] This is not an action, so cost reductions referring to an action do not apply.  (e.g. {Charisma}, {Erichtho})
[VAL] The card is not "played" by the minion (e.g. {Louhi}'s ability cannot cancel it).
[VAL] Cost reductions that are not referring to an action apply .

[aus] If this action is blocked, your hand size is one card larger during the resulting combat.
[val] Only usable when an action to equip with a weapon is successful. Unlock this acting vampire.

100826.name: Gift of Experience
100826.text:
Master.
Choose an unlocked vampire you control. Lock that vampire. Search your crypt for an advancement card of that vampire (or the base vampire if an advancement is chosen) and put that card under or over the chosen vampire, as appropriate.

Ignores all "do not replace" clauses and special replacement effects on cards played from it.
The card on it cannot be discarded or burned to satisfy another effect (eg. {Tension in the Ranks} or using political action cards for votes).

100827.text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card on this Gangrel with any number of cards requiring Protean [pro] from your hand face down and out of play (you can look at the cards at any time). When played, a multi-Disciplines card counts as requiring the Discipline(s) being used. In the hand, library, or ash heap, the card is considered to require any and/or all Disciplines listed on it.

100828.text:
[obf] [ACTION MODIFIER] +1 stealth.

If the canceled card had a "do not replace until" clause (or alternate replacement like {Steely Tenacity}), that clause is canceled as well and the card is replaced normally.
The canceled card has still been played. The same reaction or modifier cannot be played again by the same minion. Any card which text prohibits to play more than once cannot be played again.
If a limited effect is canceled (bleed, additional strike), then the limit is not triggered and another limited effect can be used.
If an action is canceled, it is not performed and the minion is free to attempt the same action again.
Can only cancel minion cards played from the hand in the normal fashion (eg. can't cancel allies played via {Piper}).
Can be used to cancel all action cards, including employ retainer, recruit ally and political action.
Cancelation must be immediate: a wake can be used in the "as played" window, but a reaction to "unlock and attempt to block" cannot.
Can be used if there is no action, but that allowance does not extend to other reactions (eg. wake effects).
